name: Primordial Ten Fiends: Others Tame Beasts, I Tame Beast Girls
author: Pikapi &#40噼咔噼&#41
content: After three years of lying low, Lin Han awakened the Beast Taming System and gained ten ultra-fierce beast girls! Tearing apart enemies by day and taming beast girls by night, he was directly drained by them into becoming the pinnacle of global combat power!
